name: Candytrail
long_description: We are building conversation intelligence for high-ticket in person teams, recording every customer interaction to pull out analytics and insights. We’re like Gong or Granola for offline retail — identifying the talk tracks that drive higher close rates, surfacing common customer questions, and delivering actionable insights to in-person teams after every consultation. We're starting with med spas and expanding into IV clinics, plastic surgery, and real estate auctions.
